amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning the decision of the Supreme Court in Roe v. Wade.

vote.text: Amendment SA 260 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 48.

action.text: Amendment SA 260 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S3581-3600; text: CR S3581) To express the sense of the Senate concerning the decision of the Supreme Court in Roe v. Wade.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 260 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 48.
